jobs_results.title: Senior Software Engineer (BB-87584)
jobs_results.description: Job SummaryWork on software design, implementation, verification and coordinate with US software team and software vendors on software related projects. Ensure that all product development conforms to design specifications and coding standards for medical devices.ResponsibilitiesSupport project team activities related to product development lifecycle, certification, and problem solvingMember of small project development teamDesign and develop web-based solutionsWork on technical problems related web developmentComfortable with doing both frontend and backend workParticipate in design & code reviewsSupport validation activities per organization policies and proceduresCreate technical deliverables and provide technical Subject Matter ExpertiseParticipate in Agile development lifecycle methodology, code configuration management process and code deployment processProvide input into technical design & implementation and system configuration managementGenerate and maintain technical... documentation required to support design control requirement and regulatory submissionsWork closely with cross functional teams and external vendors to ensure timely project deliveryRequirementsBachelor’s degree in computer science, web development or equivalent is requiredMinimum 3 years web application development experience in Java/Kotlin, JavaScriptExperience working in medical device industry is advantageousExperience in Spring Boot, Git and API integrationKnowledge of software integration testingBasic cybersecurity knowledgeFamiliarity with cloud framework and Database experience is preferredAgile environment is preferredSwift/IOS and/or Android development for mobile development is preferredTeam player qualities and good interpersonal skills

jobs_results.title: Filenet Senior Developer / Developer
jobs_results.description:
Responsibilities
• Report to Development Lead
• Develops software solutions by studying information needs; conferring with users; studying systems flow, data usage, and work processes; investigating problem areas; following the software development lifecycle.
• Determines operational feasibility by evaluating analysis, problem definition, requirements, solution development, and proposed solutions.
• Documents and demonstrates solutions by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, code comments and clear code.
• Prepares and installs solutions by determining and designing system specifications, standards, and programming.
• Improves operations by conducting systems analysis, recommending changes in policies and procedures.
• Updates job knowledge by studying state-of-the-art development tools, programming techniques, and computing equipment; participating in educational opportunities; reading professional publications; maintaining personal networks; participating... in professional organizations.
• Protects operations by keeping information confidential.
• Provides information by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing development and service issues.
• Accomplishes engineering and organization mission by completing related results as needed.
• Supports and develops software engineers by providing advice, coaching and educational opportunities.
• Provide level 2 and 3 support to business users.
Requirements
• Minimum 3 years work experience with the following languages and tools:
• Experience in IBM FileNet P8, strong in IBM Case Manager. Experience in customization using widgets of IBM Case Manager and IBM content Navigator, designing the FileNet workflows.
• Familiar to IBM FileNet Api/Web Service Development.
• Experience in programming in Javascript jquery, json, C#
• Experience in SQL server
• Expertise in the design, implementation, and deployment of user-centric software, with focus on usability
• Understanding and practicing of Agile methodologies
• Certification in mobile development or equivalent
• Good knowledge of DevOps, automated testing would be beneficial.

Shortlisted candidates will be offered a 1 Year Direct Contract employment

jobs_results.title: Software Developer (.net)
jobs_results.description:
Main Responsibilities
• Proposed creative ways to configuration our product software to meet customer’s needs
• Be the Subject Matter Expert for all software enquiries and support queries from other departments
• Attend software demo and discussion with customers for software deployment and integration.
• Proposed creative ways to configuration our product software to meet customer’s needs
• Support software vender to integrate with Glory products. Conduct integration training and support troubleshooting.
• Plan and train relevant parties on software related matters
• Perform comprehensive testing to validate software performance and stability before installation
• Perform system (hardware and software) integration certification test on our partners’ application before actual deployment
• Perform field installation and training when necessary
• Attend / analyze and troubleshoot field problems that are related to software
• Create / update documents such as software configuration, test... data, user guides and etc
• New requirement drafting based on Customers’ needs
• Modify software script / tools to meet customers’ need or enhance internal operations

Job Requirements
• Experienced in Hands on Programming in C#.NET Windows Platform
• API Integration
• Willing to learn mindset
• Team Player and Good Communicator
• Involvement of the role would be 60% Development, 20% Support 20% Demo

jobs_results.title: Software Engineer (Java Microservices)
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer specializing in Java Microservices in Singapore to make the team stronger.

Responsibilities
• Write high quality, testable code following clean code and SOLID design principles
• Conduct code reviews
• Create design, technical and project documentation
• Plan and schedule own work for tasks and projects, also implement functionality without direct supervision
• Perform profiling and troubleshooting of existing solutions
• Coordinate application deployment
• Follow and understand defined software development process
• Participate in workshops and presentation of proposed solutions to clients
• Communicate with the clients on a regular basis to clarify business requirements
• Assist team members with providing of technical solutions
• Work independently while in close collaboration with others in the team and across projects

Requirements
• Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science, Software Engineering or related majors
• Strong... programming experience of more than 5 years and deep knowledge on data structure and algorithms
• Typical tech stack for this role: Java 8/11, Spring Boot, JUnit/Mockito, MySQL, Kafka, Avro, git, Jenkins, PCF, DDD/BDD/TDD
• Need to be strong in Spring Cloud
• Strong Microservices
• DS and Algorithms: looking for problem solving skills and the ability to optimize code
• PCF: Manage and own the pipeline. We will consider strong Developers without PCF experience but the individual must be willing to learn PCF quickly
• Fundamental knowledge on Docker and Kubernetes will be helpful. Know how to scale up and down etc
• Secure coding practices
• OS: Linux etc. Basic commands knowledge needed to browse the logs etc. to understand the issues better

Nice to have
• Pair programming experience: Currently not completely doing Pair programming but would like to get there in near future

We offer
• Friendly team and enjoyable working environment
• Work-life balance and flexible schedule
• Online training library, mentoring, career development and potential partial grant of certification
• Unlimited access to LinkedIn learning solutions
• Referral bonuses
• Compensation for sick leave and paid time off
• Opportunities for self-realization

jobs_results.title: QA Engineer
jobs_results.description: We are looking for candidates who: are passionate about QUALITY and finding and solving problems for our own products and services are also passionate about challenge and growth love to learn new technologies are adaptive and resilient love to work as a team have the required skills and relevant experience currently live in Singapore Your key responsibilities are: Ensuring product quality meeting customer needs and supporting TeamSpirit brand Actively working with product managers, developers and customer services to identify possible risks, gaps and discrepancies etc. and take them into test strategies Assessing and promoting new tools and concepts including automation in QA domain to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of the QA process Analyzing and managing incidents in product development and providing product manager with the information for their decision making. Your roles are: To develop testing strategies aligned with the development process To work as a member of scrum... team with software engineers and product manager (they may be based in Japan) To work closely not only with teams in Singapore but also with those in Japan To proactively clarify and understand the scope of product developments. To estimate work volume To design and carry out various tests based on the plan To monitor and analyze quality metrics and develop the quality report To lead discussions to improve product quality Required skills and experience: At least 3 years of working experience as QA engineer in software development A bachelor's or master's degree in software design, engineering, or computer science - preferred An understanding of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes Strong written and verbal communication skills Knowledge of SQL and scripting Knowledge of the current trends and latest advancements Experience in scrum development - preferred Experience in using JIRA - good to have Software engineering background - preferred ISTQB certified - good to have

jobs_results.title: Wintel Engineer
jobs_results.description:
1. As part of a team of infrastructure team to ensure smooth operations
that conformed with the
agreed Service Level Agreement (SLA) and within the budgeted capital and
operational expenses.
2. To establish ITSM standards, processes and guidelines that are in line
with industry standards and
best practices
3. Provide technical leadership to team members
4. Provide technical consultancy to customers on matters related to
system performance, integration
and configuration.
5. Assist project Service Delivery Manager on managing the day-to-day
Operations management.
6. Subject Matter Expert (SME) level of hands-on knowledge in shell,
Perl, Python or PowerShell
7. Analyze system performance and makes recommendations for optimization.
8. Ensure that the production environment is highly available per the
needs of the business and
established Service Level Agreements.
9. Lead and establish Root Cause Analysis for all High Severity issues.
Work with multiple teams for
successful resolution of... issues and incidents
10. Review Incident Report.
11. Participate in the upgrade/patching planning and execution of the
Middleware software.
12. Provide subject matter expertise (SME) for Issues, security related
threats and vulnerabilities as it
pertains to middleware.
13. Participation in establish and test disaster recovery policies and
procedures across all Middleware
environments
14. Ensure adherence to applicable Change and Release Management
processes.
15. Develop technical documentation and procedure on monitoring,
performance.
16. Regular projects reporting update to SDM & any other duties as and
when assigned
17. Lead problem determination on system errors or malfunctions, and
works with the application
team/supplier to identify, diagnose and rectify the problem.
18. Performs capacity study to analyze current resource utilization and
estimates future requirements.
19. Monitoring system to ensure high availability and optimal performance
20. Update documentation of work.
21. Supports internal and external audit exercises for the maintenance of
various certifications and
contractual requirements.
22. Keeps abreast of technological advancement, emerging standards and
new software or hardware
solutions that may affect decisions on systems building or enhancements
23. Strong communication and documentation skills
24. Flexible and able to adapt to a rapidly changing environment
25. Positive, self-motivated inpidual who can complete tasks
independently
26. Must be a team player
27. Must be willing to travel and executing overseas project when is
required.
28. Must be able to work in 24 x 7 operations standby support environment

Requirements:

1. Bachelors degree in Computer Science (or related area) preferred
2. At least 8 years of working experience in end to end operations
management experience which
includes configuring, upgradation and resolution related to Wintel
infrastructures such as Windows
Servers, OS clustering, Hyper-V and VMware Virtualization, IIS, Biztalk
and other related products
and cloud services such as AWS, MS Azure.
3. Specializing in one of major products: Microsoft, VMware, AWS & MS
Azure.
4. Hands-on experience on Windows system & OS clustering administration,
configuration and
troubleshooting
5. Hands-on experience on Microsoft middleware e.g. IIS administration
and configuration
6. Hands-on experience on managing large scale environment running on
server virtualization
technologies like VMWare Server/ESX or Microsoft HyperV/Virtual Server
7. Good understanding of ITIL processes. Familiar with ISO 9001 and ISO
27001.
8. Working experience in cloud environment (AWS, Azure) would be an
advantage
9. Microsoft Certification (MCSA/MCSE) or equivalent certification in
relevant programs is required.
10. VMware Certification (VCP) or equivalent certification in relevant
programs is required.
11. AWS/Microsoft Azure cloud certification is required.
12. ITIL v3 certification is required
13. RedHat Red hat Enterprise Linux certification is desired
14. Cloud related experience in Microsoft Azure, AWS, Google cloud,
15. DevOps tools Ansible, Docker, Jenkins, Kubernetes (including
scripting experiences)
Interested applicants please send your CV to
qashrina.iqbal@theoptimum.net

jobs_results.title: Software Manager
jobs_results.description:
Salary Range:$6K-$8K + AWS + VB + allowance
5 working days, Mon – Fri , normal office hours
Location:Central

Responsibilities
• Responsible for developing Enterprise software services and platforms from governance and implementing best development practices
• To work with pre-sales on technical proposals and evaluation of application architecture solution
• Staying abreast of latest technology and work with R&D team on conceptualized design and prototype into solution for end user’s business requirement
• Providing technical leadership to software engineers by coaching and mentoring throughout end-to-end software development, maintenance and life cycle to achieve project goals

Requirements
• Degree in IT / Computer Science / Software Engineering or equivalent
• Enterprise Architecture Certified is a plus
• With 3 – 4 year(s) of relevant working experience in dockers, DevOps and / or data analytics domain will be advantageous
• Possess programming knowledge – C#, Java and software... Architecture knowledge – OOP, CSSLP

Interested candidates, please send your updated CV in MS Words format stating your last drawn salary, expected salary, notice period and reason for leaving last / past employment(s) and email to recruit21@caed.com.sg for priority processing.

Attn: Jace Tay (Registration No.: R1331152)

CAREER EDGE ASIA PTE LTD
EA Licence Number: 13C6678
To find out more job opportunities, visit Career Edge Asia at www.caed.com.sg for all job listings.
Email: recruit@caed.com.sg

jobs_results.title: Java Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Duties: As a key member of the Product Software Engineering team you will be responsible for designing and developing APIs. You will be involved in the development lifecycle from architecture, design, implementation, testing and support with a focus on delivering solutions adhering to business goals, technical requirements and engineering standards.

Job Responsibilities

Hands on Design, Development, Deployment & Support of API Engineering Platform

Incorporates standards and best practices, including performance, security, scalability and maintainability

Interact with Business System Analysts to design and deliver technical solutions to support various business functions

Work in a Globally Distributed Development team environment to enable successful delivery with a minimal supervision

Advocate, document, and follow best design and development practices

Skills
• BS/MS CS/SE/EE degree or equivalent with 6+ years in the field of Software Engineering and Development
• An obsession... with customer experience, product fidelity, developer documentation, API ecosystem and exceptional developer experience.
• Minimum 5+ years of experience in building Platforms, Frameworks & API's using Open Source Java is mandatory (Spring Boot)
• Exposure to the other frameworks Play, Akka, Netty.IO, Node.js etc. are nice to have
• Strong working experience in micro services API first development, API gateway & API Orchestration
• Experience working with Open Source API Gateway Frameworks, Mulesoft/Apigee API Gateway is a huge plus
• Hands-on Experience in AWS/GCP and technologies like Ansible, Containers, Kubernetes etc is a plus
• AWS Certified Developer Associate is a plus
• Good understanding of CI/CD systems and Container based deployments on Docker.
• Working Knowledge on Reactive/Functional Programming is highly desirable
• Excellent understanding of Service oriented design & architecture, Application Integration & Messaging, Security and Web 2.0.
• Strong understanding of design patterns and best practices in Java
• Strong Experience/Knowledge on Data modeling (RDBMS, XSD, JSON), Database/XML interaction, SQL, Stored Procedure and ORM.
• Exceptional communication, organization and presentation skills
• Experience working with in Agile or Scaled Agiled Framework is required

options.text: Bee Cheng Hiang Hup Chong Foodstuff Pte Ltd
